div.span: We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. Our thoughtfully designed, pet friendly, and smoke-free homes feature quartz stone countertops, ENERGY STAR® stainless steel appliances, hard surface plank flooring and tile backsplash. Plus, our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers pre-installed high-speed and community-wide WiFi, the ability to submit maintenance requests and pay your rent online, Amazon Hub package lockers, and more. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Live your life effortlessly with amenities that include a state-of-the-art fitness center, WAG Dog Park and Pet Spa, landscaped courtyards with gas grills, fire pits and lounge seating, and pool with spa. Avalon Chino Hills is adjacent to Pinehurst Park, a public park spanning 14 beautiful acres. The community is one mile from the 71 freeway, and equidistant from the 60 and 91, offering easy access to nearby major employment centers. This is not just apartment living. This is living up.

div.h2: The service. The standards. The life.

a.div: Great service is one of the things we think about most. We start with selecting passionate people. Then we let them put that passion to work. Our people are a vital part of what shapes the character of each Avalon community.

We strive to align our standards with yours, delivering an experience that lives up to them. We know you've put a lot into getting to where you are in life. We believe where you live should reflect that. So we put ourselves into making sure it does.

Effortless. Enjoyable. Truly comfortable living is both. That's why we go out of our way to choose locations and to design amenities that put so much within reach. So you can live easy without even trying.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

div.h2: Only the best for your best life

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Homes fully furnished and connected to give you the lifestyle you deserve. Flexible lease terms for the ultimate convenience.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: See what we do to take pet friendly living to the next level.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: From fitness amenities to resident perks, we offer a variety of spaces and places to help you meet your wellness goals.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Our technology package gives you ease of access and can allow you to save on monthly expenses.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Start earning points on rent with our free residents reward program. Use your points for travel, future rent credit, fitness classes, and more.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Our apartment homes are designed with sustainability in mind, so you can live in an environment that’s lighter on the planet and its resources.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Pay rent, submit a service request, find policies and more with our convenient online resident portal.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Offering a wealth of resident resources, our Relocation Advantage program assists in making your transition a smooth one.

h3.class: ant-typography community-amenities-title font-primary font-24 text-default font-weight-normal

div.div: Pet friendly community featuring WAG Pet Spa and outdoor WAG Pet Park
Gourmet kitchens with quartz stone countertops, ENERGY STAR® stainless steel appliances and tile backsplashes.

div.class: community-contact-info-mobile-bg absolute-top absolute-bottom community-contact-info-bg-overlay h-100 w-100 d-none-md

div.p: We are here for you. Let us know how we can help you find your perfect home.

li.a: Do Not Sell My Personal Information

Plus, our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers pre-installed high-speed and community-wide WiFi, the ability to submit maintenance requests and pay your rent online, Amazon Hub package lockers, and more. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Live your life effortlessly with amenities that include a state-of-the-art fitness center, WAG Dog Park and Pet Spa, landscaped courtyards with gas grills, fire pits and lounge seating, and pool with spa. Avalon Chino Hills is adjacent to Pinehurst Park, a public park spanning 14 beautiful acres. The community is one mile from the 71 freeway, and equidistant from the 60 and 91, offering easy access to nearby major employment centers. This is not just apartment living.
